name: Meet Santa
description:
***FULL IPHONE 5 SUPPORT!!!***

CHRISTMAS IS COMING UP, AND SANTA NEEDS YOUR HELP!

"It's kinda like Guitar Hero." -comment from a fan

***Meet Santa***
From Astro Crow - the creators of the hit iPhone game The Last Ace of Space!

Santa's a busy guy - delivering presents to all the good boys and girls in the world in one night is no easy task! That's why he's decided to make his work easier this year - for all the lucky children in line to meet Santa at the Happytown Mall today, he's going to just give them what they want early! But he could really use a helper - how about YOU?

In this game, YOU are Santa's #1 helper. When the children tell Santa what they want for Christmas, you have to flick them the present that they want. But be quick- these kids change their mind fast! How high of a score can you get before your time runs out? HO HO HO!

***MERRY CHRISTMAS FROM ASTRO CROW!***
